title: Facebook Joins Esports Fray With Early Debut of Gaming Tournaments
text: With people all over the world stuck at home with no live sports to watch, competitive video gaming has become all the rage.

title: Instagram's co-founder ignored suggestions to copy Snapchat's best feature before finally relenting
text: In the upcoming book "No Filter: The Inside Story of Instagram," Bloomberg reporter Sarah Frier lays out the case that Instagram Co-founder Kevin Systrom was actually the main obstacle to be overcome in the social network's decision to rip off rival Snapchat's Stories feature, rather than the mastermind behind the sea-shifting decision.

title: Lacking eyeballs, Facebook’s ad review system fails to spot coronavirus harm
text: Facebook’s ad review system is failing to prevent coronavirus misinformation from being targeted at its users, according to an investigation by Consumer Reports. The not-for-profit consumer advocacy organization set out to test Facebook’s system by setting up a page for a made-up organization, called the Self Preservation Society, and creating ads that contained false or […]

title: There was a lot of opportunity in second half of Q1: Oakmark's Coniaris
text: Tony Coniaris, portfolio manager at Oakmark, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss the markets and trading during the selloff.

title: 3 Reasons Facebook Stock Is a Long-Term Buy
text: Facebook stock is still well off its highs. While that's frustrating for current investors, it presents a long-term opportunity in FB stock.

title: Facebook (FB) Launches Tuned App for Couples Amid Lockdown
text: Facebook (FB) launches free Tuned app for couples in the United States and Canada amid coronavirus-induced lockdown.

title: Facebook launches Tuned app for couples
text: Facebook has launched an app for couples called Tuned that will allow them to build a digital scrapbook.

title: Coronavirus Bear Market: 5 Large-Cap Stocks to Buy
